description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Japan vs Colombia in the Friendlies Women
title: Japan vs Colombia: Friendlies Women stats & head-to-head
title_page: Japan vs Colombia: Friendlies Women stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Goal! Japan 1, Colombia 1. Hana Takahashi (Japan) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the centre of the goal.
